page.title: 13A Killamarsh Publican
page.content: Mrs.Robinson is a publican she lives in Killamarsh at the Nags head pub. She has worked in four pubs and has been in this pub since 1984.They have one main brand of beer called Tetley and it is 70p a pint.There is a television in the pool room and also a dart board.The pub is a very old pub it is about 900 years old.There is also a one armed bandit in the pub for entertainment.They don't sell food in the pub they just sell drinks and things like that.The pub starts to get busy at about 9.00pm.They open at dinner time and close at 3.00pm.Then open at 7.00pm again until midnight. Mrs. Robinson says "It's hard being a publican".The Nags Head pub was mentioned in the last Domesday project. The pub is not open to children at the moment.
